posts.text:
American Classic is re-entering the mountain bike tire game with four different tread patterns and three construction levels starting at just $45 per tire! Check out their new tire line-up here…

https://bikepacking.com/news/american-classic-mtb-tires/

attachment.caption: American Classic MTB Tires Start at $45

posts.text:
Unveiled at Eurobike this week, the new Pelago Thórsmörk is an adventure-ready hardtail mountain bike that marks an unexpected step for the Helsinki, Finland-based brand. Find initial details and a handful of photos here…
https://bikepacking.com/news/pelago-thorsmork/

The new Wayfinder Fork from Minnesota-based Wilde Bikes is a modern carbon utility fork with clearance for 29 x 2.1″ tires, three-pack mounts, and more. Check it out here…

https://bikepacking.com/news/wilde-bikes-wayfinder-fork/

attachment.caption: Introducing the Wilde Bikes Wayfinder Fork

posts.text:
The Lunigiana Trail is a 230-kilometer weekend bikepacking loop that crosses the most remote and wild areas of the Lunigiana region in the north of Tuscany. Bumpy gravel roads, singletrack trails, absence of telephone/internet coverage, and the lack of resupply points make this trail a challenging multi-day mountain bike adventure.

https://bikepacking.com/routes/lunigiana-trail/

Follow along in Mikkel Soya Bølstad’s latest video as he and his partner cycle coast to coast on a bikepacking journey across Denmark in search of Denmark’s wild side with their Jack Russell terrier, Banjo…

https://bikepacking.com/plog/bikepacking-across-denmark-video/

attachment.caption: 6 Days Bikepacking Across Denmark With Our Dog (video)

posts.text:
Aside from the stories, in-depth reviews, and other content that’s been keeping us busy, we’ve also been planning and developing several new projects and tools for our Bikepacking Collective and the broader bikepacking community. Learn more about our Bucket List application, Ride Buddy Network, Ask the Experts forums, and more developments here…

https://bikepacking.com/news/bucket-list-app-community-tools/

attachment.caption: Bucket List App, Ride Buddy Network + More Community Tools
